com.uce.userlab.haptics
Interface Device

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhantomDevice
public interface Device

This Interface provides a gerneric Interface for haptic device communication, it provides the basic methods/functionality for communicating with a haptic device. This has been developed to provide a standard contract for device encapsulating Objects that provide access to devices of different manufacture and specification. The purpose of this is allow classes to be developed that provide processing and managing of haptic devices without needing to know the device persific details of that device.
